registerServerApp

protected boolean registerServerApp(java.lang.String appName)
Method to register a server app

Returns:
True if the application has been registered, False otherwise or if the application has been already registered. If true, creates a new Hashtable to store application settings.

setAppPassword

protected boolean setAppPassword(java.lang.String appName,
                                 int password)
Set the password for the application. it could be called only one time for application. It is called from ThreadManager when a new application is started and associate the password with the application.

Parameters:
appName - the Application Name
password - the password to be associated to the application.
Returns:
true if the method associate the password to the application, false otherwise

getAppFromPassword

protected java.lang.String getAppFromPassword(int password)
                                       throws java.security.AccessControlException
Get the password for the application. It is called from all methods that wants to know wich application is associated to the password.

Parameters:
password - the password associated to the application.
Returns:
the application name
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null or not exist an application associate to the password.

                                         java.lang.String address)
                                  throws java.security.AccessControlException

Parameters:
password - the password that represent the application.
address - the ID Bluetooth of the user.
Returns:
true if the user is registered to the application associated to the password, false otherwise.

java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null or not exist an application associate to the password.

getTimeLastCommunication

protected long getTimeLastCommunication(java.lang.String address)
Method to get the last communication time.

Parameters:
address - is the client address
Returns:
a long measuring the difference, in milliseconds, between the last communication time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC

getRemainingTimeBeforePingOut

public long getRemainingTimeBeforePingOut(int password,
                                          java.lang.String address)
                                   throws java.security.AccessControlException
Get the remaining time before the user have to be disconnected from server because of Ping Out

Parameters:
password - the password that represent the application.
address - the ID Bluetooth of the user.
Returns:
the remaining time in milliseconds
Throws:
java.security.AccessControlException - It is sent when the password is null or not exist an application associate to the password.
